import_tariffs_yaml.title: Import Tariffs from YAML
import_tariffs_yaml.description:
Paste your tariff periods as YAML. This will replace all existing tariffs.

Expected format:
```
periods:
  - start: "00:00"
    end: "07:00"
    import_price: 0.12
    feed_in_price: 0.05
```

error.invalid_time: Invalid time. Use HH:MM format, e.g. 09:00, 17:30.
error.invalid_duration: Invalid duration. Use h/m/s components, e.g. 1h, 30m, 1h30m.
error.invalid_yaml: Invalid YAML. Check the format and try again.
error.invalid_yaml_time: Invalid time in YAML. Times must use HH:MM format (e.g. 09:00, 17:30).
error.invalid_yaml_price: Invalid price in YAML. Prices must be non-negative numbers.
